content.raw:
I made a few changes on branch [haptix_logging_louise](#!/osrf/gazebo_tutorials/commits/424e82cafd989a52ff523bbb1c13b340f026652d), feel free to merge the parts you agree with.

http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=haptix_logging&branch=haptix_logging_louise

Obs: I removed the `%%%` because it wraps the images on a "Do not copy" box and requires you to horizontally scroll the images
content.html:
I made a few changes on branch haptix_logging_louise, feel free to merge the parts you agree with.

http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=haptix_logging&branch=haptix_logging_louise

Obs: I removed the %%% because it wraps the images on a "Do not copy" box and requires you to horizontally scroll the images
